td.span: A set of codes to describe the discharge notification disagreement.

concept.displayName: Social Services cannot confirm agreement to the discharge date but the planned services are being arranged. I will confirm closer to the discharge date.
Social Services cannot confirm agreement to the planned services and so cannot agree to the discharge date.
Social Services cannot confirm agreement to the discharge date as the assessment process has not been completed.
Social Services cannot confirm agreement to the discharge date as the patient/family has not yet agreed to the planned services.
Social Services cannot confirm agreement to the discharge date as the patient/family is not eligible for services funded by social services.
Social Services cannot confirm agreement to the discharge date as public funding has not yet been agreed.
Social Services do not agree that it is safe to discharge the patient on the stated date.
The previously arrange services to be provided by social services are not no longer available on discharge.
The person has withdrawn their consent to social services involvement.
Social services cannot confirm agreement to discharge date because awaiting services to be arranged.
